messages.message: 95807-52 - PAP NAP (Ideal for non-compliant CPAP users)
95805 - MSLT(Multiple Sleep Lantency Test), MWT(Maintenance of Wakefulness Test)
95810 + 95827 - Seizure Montage Study (Checks for nocturnal seizures and parasomnias)
United STAT Sleep Account Activation Link

Hello {1},
Thank you for signing up for an account at United STAT Sleep!
To complete your registration, please confirm your account by clicking on the following link or copying the URL into your browser.
Please click here to confirm your registration or copy and paste the following URL into your browser: (Note: be sure to copy the entire URL, including any part of it which goes onto a second line.)
{3}

message.p: Thank you for signing up for an account at United STAT Sleep!
To complete your registration, please confirm your account by clicking on the following link or copying the URL into your browser.
Please click here to confirm your registration or copy and paste the following URL into your browser: (Note: be sure to copy the entire URL, including any part of it which goes onto a second line.)
A password reset has been requested for your account at United STAT Sleep.
If you requested this reset, then choose a new password by clicking on the following link or copying the URL into your browser.

If you did not request this, you can safely ignore and discard this email. There is no way for a password reset to occur without clicking or copying the link. If you have security concerns, please email us at your earliest convenience: security@statsleep.com
Please click here to choose a new password or copy and paste the following URL into your browser: (Note: be sure to copy the entire URL, including any part of it which goes onto a second line.)

messages.message:
Hello {1},
A password reset has been requested for your account at United STAT Sleep.
If you requested this reset, then choose a new password by clicking on the following link or copying the URL into your browser.
If you did not request this, you can safely ignore and discard this email. There is no way for a password reset to occur without clicking or copying the link. If you have security concerns, please email us at your earliest convenience: security@statsleep.com.
Please copy and paste the following URL into your browser: (Note: be sure to copy the entire URL, including any part of it which goes onto a second line.)
{3}
